Issue.creator: andrew-coleman
Issue.summary: Move support for CCP from fabric-client to fabric-network
Issue.description: The common-connection profile (CPP) is a high-level abstraction to simplify the definition of fabric networks to the SDK. To simplify the low-level fabric-client API and make it as stateless as possible, the API (& implementation) to parse and process the CCP should be moved from `fabric-client` to `fabric-network`.
